alert.note: Alert for Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 8:12PM CDT until April 15 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Union County in south central Arkansas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 811 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lawson, or 8 miles southeast of El Dorado, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Norphlet, Huttig, Junction City, Strong, Calion, Urbana, Lawson, Wesson, Lapile, Felsenthal, Newell, New London, Aurelle, Pigeon Hill, Hillsboro, Lockhart and Catesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
